targets.query:
from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy_kWh")
  |> drop(columns:["year","month","pce","pce_alias","_measurement","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"
from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -7d, stop: -6d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "energy_kWh"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"
    )
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","_field","weekday_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "actual")

import "date"

from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -1y, stop: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["month"] == string(v: date.month(t: -1d)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "energy_kWh"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"
    )
  |> drop(columns:["year","weekday_name","weekday_no","pce","pce_alias","month","_measurement","type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

import "date"
from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -1y, stop: 1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_price_measure")
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "days")

data = from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -1mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "energy_kWh"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"
    )
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "data")
  

minData = data
|> min()
|> yield(name: "min")


maxData = data
|> max()
|> yield(name: "max")

import "date"

from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -1y, stop: -0mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["month"] == string(v: date.month(t: -1mo)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "energy_kWh"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"
    )
  |> drop(columns:["year","weekday_name","weekday_no","month","pce","pce_alias","_measurement","type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"

data = from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -2mo, stop: -0mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "energy_kWh"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"
    )
  |> drop(columns:["year","weekday_name","month_name","weekday_no","pce","pce_alias","_measurement","type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()
  
m1 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["month"] == string(v: date.month(t: -1mo)))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m1: r._value }))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
|> keep(columns:["m1","key"])

m2 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["month"] == string(v: date.month(t: now())))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m2: r._value }))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
|> keep(columns:["m2","key"])

join(
  tables: {m1: m1, m2: m2},
  on: ["key"],
  method: "inner"
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
  trend:  
  if not exists r["m1"] or r["m1"] == 0.0 then 0.0
  else ((r["m2"]-r["m1"]) / r["m1"] )*100.0
  }))
|> keep(columns:["trend"])
|> yield(name: "percent")

import "date"

from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -2y, stop: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: -1y)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "energy_kWh"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"
    )
  |> drop(columns:["weekday_name","weekday_no","month_name","pce","pce_alias","month","_measurement","type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>

    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cost_eur"  
    else r["_field"] == "gas_mcube"

  |> drop(columns:["month","weekday_name","month_name","weekday_no","pce","pce_alias","_measurement","type"])

  |> group()
  
m1 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: -1y)))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m1: r._value }))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
|> keep(columns:["m1","key"])

m2 = data
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: now())))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m2: r._value }))
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
|> keep(columns:["m2","key"])

join(
  tables: {m1: m1, m2: m2},
  on: ["key"],
  method: "inner"
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
  trend:  
  if not exists r["m1"] or r["m1"] == 0.0 then 0.0
  else ((r["m2"]-r["m1"]) / r["m1"] )*100.0
  }))
|> keep(columns:["trend"])
|> yield(name: "percent")

from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: -2y, stop: 1y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pce_alias"] == "$pce")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure" or r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_thresold_measure" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy_kWh" or r["_field"] == "cost_eur")
  |> drop(columns:["month","year","weekday_no","weekday_name","pce","pce_alias","month_name","_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

list.definition:
import "date"
from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: 1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_pce_measure")
  |> keep(columns:["pce_alias"])
  |> group()
